remarks: Zero in the ordered power series ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
opsr0.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
opsr0.o $e |- O = ( ( I ordPwSer R ) ` T ) $.
opsr0.t $e |- ( ph -> T C_ ( I X. I ) ) $.
opsr0 $p |- ( ph -> ( 0g ` S ) = ( 0g ` O ) ) $.
